content.html: There's nothing like being at #EIC2022, a conference all about identity and security, where phishing and hacking have been a major theme across all the talks, and then getting a "is this you?" push on my phone from an IP on a sketchy VPN followed by a password reset email
content.value: There's nothing like being at #EIC2022, a conference all about identity and security, where phishing and hacking have been a major theme across all the talks, and then getting a "is this you?" push on my phone from an IP on a sketchy VPN followed by a password reset email
